jobs.name: webhook-health-check
jobs.description: Checks webhook endpoint health every 6 hours

jobs.name: webhook-stats-cleanup
jobs.description: Cleans up old webhook statistics daily at 2:00 AM UTC

jobs.name: webhook-rate-limit-reset
jobs.description: Resets webhook rate limiting counters daily at midnight UTC

jobs.name: webhook-test-ping
jobs.description: Sends test ping to webhook endpoints every 15 minutes for monitoring
